name: This is Hell (Hackfleisch Dev)
description:
This is Hell is a plattformer made with the Game Maker 8 game-engine.

It's a 2d plattformer with the black-white-red color scheme.

Collect the Blood, get somke scores, provend the Spikys and go to the end to collect the Diamond.

(This Game is in pre-alpha)
